ij.plugin

Class JpegWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ij.plugin.JpegWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlugIn

    public class JpegWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlugIn
    The File/Save As/Jpeg command (FileSaver.saveAsJpeg() method) uses this plugin to save images in JPEG format.
